koti sanwidhanaya ha ehi nayakathwaya wishwasa kara minimaru, bomba pipirawu, hamudawalata ha polisiyata pahara dun, oththu dun siya gananak samanya koti kriyadharayan dirghakalinawa siragatha wi sitinne karuna, kepi wani owunge nayakayan ha wenath athi haki aya nithiyen galawi sitina sandarbhaya thula ma ya.
